issue.title: [Rust] cast kernel does not support casting from Int64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5065](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5065). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should also add some unit tests
